experiences.title: Operations Engineer Trainee
achievements: Assisted in project execution and resource management
Monitored machinery status and workflow to ensure optimal performance

experiences.title: Software Engineer Trainee
achievements: Gained hands-on experience in embedded systems development using AVR and ARM architectures.
Programmed embedded applications in Python within a Linux environment, integrating hardware and software components.
Designed, simulated, and tested PCBs for multiple embedded projects, including a smart home system.
Led the development of a functional smart home prototype, combining hardware control with software interfaces.
